div.p:
Have a project right now?
We can help you sell and deliver your first project. Working together on your first project is the best way to success in Odoo.
Learn more by reading our Implementation Methodology

t.t: You can download Odoo Enterprise sources and Installers.

t.div: The Github user is already linked to another subscription. Please unlink it first or contact support if you don't know on which subscription this user is linked.

t.p: Upgrade to Learning Partner to get full access to Odoo Enterprise sources and installers.

div.t-attf-class: col-md-3 col-md-offset-1 text-center panel #{partner_grade.id == 3 and 'o_partner_dashboard_grade_active_silver' or 'o_partner_dashboard_grade_inactive'}
col-md-3 col-md-offset-1 text-center panel #{partner_grade.id == 2 and 'o_partner_dashboard_grade_active_gold' or 'o_partner_dashboard_grade_inactive'}

a.t-attf-class: btn btn-sm btn-default #{not partner_grade and 'o_partner_dashboard_grade_active' or 'o_partner_dashboard_grade_inactive'}
btn btn-sm btn-default #{partner_grade and partner_grade.id == 5 and 'o_partner_dashboard_grade_active' or 'o_partner_dashboard_grade_inactive'}

option.t-att-selected: country.id == int(country_id) if country_id else country.id == source.country_id.id
